Package ru.nsu.romanov.graph

Interface Graph<V>

Type Parameters:
V - type of vertex.
All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphAdjMat, GraphIncidenceMat, GraphList
public interface Graph<V>
Interface for working with graph. Every vertex has VertexIndex which identifies them. If you call to invalid VertexIndex, you will have IndexBoundException.

  • Method Details

    • readFromFile

      void readFromFile(String fileName)
      read from fileName graph. This graph should be with definite structure. generic V must be String.
      Parameters:
      fileName - path to the file, which begin from Task_1_2_2.

    • addVertex

      VertexIndex addVertex(V val)
      add new Vertex to graph.
      Parameters:
      val - val of new vertex.
      Returns:
      VertexIndex of new vertex.

    • removeVertex

      void removeVertex(VertexIndex idx)
      remove vertex and all incidents edge from graph.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of this vertex.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(VertexIndex from, VertexIndex to, float weight)
      add new edge to graph. if the edge exists then replaces it.
      Parameters:
      from - component "from" from new edge.
      to - component "to" from new edge.
      weight - component weight of new edge.

    • removeEdge

      boolean removeEdge(VertexIndex from, VertexIndex to)
      remove edge of thus graph.
      Parameters:
      from - component "from" from edge.
      to - component "to" from edge.
      Returns:
      true if this edge existed, and we deleted it, false if this edge didn't exist.

    • getVertexValue

      V getVertexValue(VertexIndex idx)
      return vertex if IndexVertex = idx.
      Parameters:
      idx - VertexIndex of vertex.
      Returns:
      value of vertex.

    • setVertexValue

      void setVertexValue(VertexIndex idx, V val)
      set new value to vertex. which has VertexIndex = idx.
      Parameters:
      idx - VertexIndex of vertex.
      val - newValue of vertex.

    • getEdge

      Edge getEdge(VertexIndex from, VertexIndex to)
      return edge.
      Parameters:
      from - component from of edge.
      to - component to of edge.
      Returns:
      Edge.

    • setEdge

      boolean setEdge(VertexIndex from, VertexIndex to, float weight)
      setEdge new Edge.
      Parameters:
      from - component from of new edge.
      to - component to of new edge.
      weight - weight from of new edge.
      Returns:
      true if this edge existed and edge was changed, false if this edge didn't exist.

    • topologicalSort

      List<VertexIndex> topologicalSort(VertexIndex start)
      make Topological Sort and return vector. return null if graph can't have Topological Sort.
      Parameters:
      start - from what vertex we start.
      Returns:
      list with vertex in topological sort order.
